name: Sacred Tales: A Great Decision
description: What is the universe? It is like a giant and beautiful curtain that holds amazing secrets. A sinful dark star which fell from the sky.. A sinister organization that wants to discover the secrets of a Galaxy; they want power, they want to impose their own rules and beliefs. But.. Something is coming to the earth, and only the Chosen Ones will be capable of facing this, avoiding a global catastrophe and an unprecedented crisis..
